content: keep your riches safe with this enchanted crochet bag inspired by the mighty dragon egg designed for both bernat maker splash and aunt lydia s classic crochet thread this magical accessory can be made in either a large or small size - both featuring the distinctive crocodile scale stitch practice treble_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet working in rounds working in row and more it s a fun and attractive way to hold all your treasures materials bernat® maker™ splash™ 8 8 oz/250 g 305 yds/279 m cherry swirl 35005 2 balls or 507 yds/463 m measurement approx 8¼ 21 cm diameter
